message:
Unneeded mutual recursion detected in these type declarations. It's recommended to rewrite 'from_clause' as follows:
type from_clause =
  | FromClause of string * ident [@@ocaml.doc " From clauses "][@@deriving
                                                                 (eq,
                                                                   (show
                                                                    {
                                                                    with_path
                                                                    = false
                                                                    }))]
Eta reduction proposed. It's recommended to rewrite it as 'loop'
